name: Courtyard Rye

reviews.title: Very nice family stay at this property
reviews.text: Our family of four stayed here for two nights in December 2005. The staff was nice enough not to mention the priceline reservation and graciously accomodated our request for a room with two double beds located on the quiet side of the hotel.

reviews.title: Good stay in Rye
reviews.text: The room and bathroom were very clean, and nicely appointed. Pod style coffee was on the bathroom sink (separate area from the toilet/tub). Our room had a balcony, chair, desk with chair, hairdryer in the closet. Plenty of towels were provided. My only complaint is that the sheets were not as soft as what I sleep on at home.

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.text: The large pool was clean and cool, and the hot tub relaxing. The pool opens early 6am - 11pm. Towels were provided poolside.

reviews.title: Nice and convenient
reviews.text: Very good complimentary coffee in the lobby each morning. Didn't eat breakfast there.

reviews.title: pleasant
reviews.text: Long walk to the Merto North trains from this location, but I think New Yorkers are used to that. I was told by the people we were visiting that there aren't sidewalks the whole way.
I stayed at this Courtyard while on business a few weeks ago.
reviews.title: Clean, welcoming hotel - a little pricy

likes.liked: — clean and spacious rooms, comfortable bed
likes.disliked: — no evening room service, lack of intelligence from AM front desk staff

reviews.text: The good - very welcoming evening staff, free internet, comfortable bed, clean bathroom and room, free breakfast
reviews.title: As expected
Bargain for NYC
reviews.text: The bad - no bellman service, AM staff couldn't seem to get me a taxi to save their lives and I almost missed my train, the price.

I booked at the last minute so my room was $250 which I thought was a lot for the location and amenities. I've stayed in hotels in downtown NYC with a lot more to offer for the same price. However, it was convenient to my earlier meetings and possibly I could have gotten a better deal by booking earlier than a week before.
reviews.title: Very Happy with my stay at the Courtyard

likes.liked: — The Price was good and the location suited me for the places I needed to visit.
— The cleanliness and comfort of my room.
likes.disliked: — The balcony was not available on the first day of my stay due to painting.

description: Our hotel has many great attractions nearby: Train station to NYC, Playland Amusement park and beach, Capital Theater, Westchester Mall, Empire City Casino, AMC Lowes 14 Theater, and great restaurants!
